attributes.action: Use our Royal Navy to stop migrants entering the UK by boats
attributes.additional_details:
This activity is illegal and the cost is being born by the British tax payer
These people have no connection with the UK
attributes.background: Use the Royal Navy to stop these migrant boats at sea , ensure they are turned around and sent back to where they came from

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
